structures

Class Point2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.Point2d

  • public class Point2d
extends java.lang.Object
    Mathematical structure for representing Cartesian points with double precision.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Point2d ORIGIN
      The origin point (0,0).
      double x
      The x-coordinate of this point.
      double y
      The y-coordinate of this point.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point2d()
      Creates a new point at (0.0).
      Point2d(double x, double y)
      Creates the point at (x,y)
      Point2d(java.awt.Point p)
      Creates a new point based on p's coordinates

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Point2d p, double epsilon)
      Returns if two points have the same perpendicular components, to within epsilon precision.
      double getDistance(Point2d p)
      Returns the he distance between this and another point.
      double getDistanceSquared(Point2d p)
      Returns the square of the distance between this and another point.
      java.awt.Point getIntegerPoint()
      Creates a integer-based point by rounding this point's coordinates.

      Returns the x component
      double getY()
      Returns the y component

      Sets the x component
      void setY(double y)
      Sets the y component
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a mathematical, String representation of this point in the form (x, y).
      Point2d translate(double dx, double dy)
      Returns the translation of this point by dx and dy.
      boolean withinDistance(Point2d p, double maxDistance)
      Returns if a point is within a certain distance/
